data.message: Wow I remember when I first heard yellawolf "Best Friend" with Eminem I don't think very many people really "KNEW" about him. They sure do know now. Can't wait for the albums to come out Eminem, and Yellawolf.

replies.message: I think til it's gone brought him some big attention. First song I heard from him was daddy's Lambo and I hated it. Didn't hear anything else from him until til it's gone was on sons of anarchy. Now I love him.
And that mix of em and pac was ok until they used an edited version of pacs verse
